name: discourse-b-editor
description: Replacing Discourse Editor (d-editor) to Better Editor (b-editor)

scripts.build: npm run build:vendor; npm run build:discourse; npm run build:b-editor
scripts.build:b-editor: babel src/b-editor --out-dir=assets/javascripts/b-editor; for file in $(find ./assets/javascripts/b-editor -name '*.js'); do mv -- "${file}" "${file/%js/es6}"; done
scripts.vendor: npm run vendor:react; npm run vendor:react-dom; npm run vendor:draft; npm run vendor:immutable

author: Quang-Buu Le <quangbuule@gmail.com>
